meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathryn Schoenberger Matt Farr Sandie Baker Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6818.

td.p: Kathryn Schoenberger, a communications associate from Washington, D.C.
Matt Farr, an associate director of annual giving from Lookout Mountain, Tennessee
Sandie Baker, a translation coordinator from Eastpointe, Michigan (whose 5-day cash winnings total $115,200)

tr.td: WE HAVE LAWS
PUP CULTURE
THAT'S PAINFUL
IOWA
POTPOURRI
THE "END" IS JUST THE BEGINNING

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
